name: Introductory Biology
description: This introductory course provides a comprehensive overview of the fundamentals of biology, including cellular processes, genetics, and evolution.

name: Microbiology I
description: This course introduces students to the study of microorganisms and their impact on humans, plants, and animals.

name: Microbiology II
description: This course provides a more in-depth look at microorganisms and their interactions with the environment.

name: Advanced Microbiology
description: This advanced course covers the molecular and biochemical basis of microbial processes, microbial ecology, and the application of microbial technology.
